Documentation

idle :: IORef GLfloat -> IORef GLfloat -> IdleCallback

The idle function is called by GLUT every tick

display :: IORef GLfloat -> IORef (GLfloat, GLfloat) -> DisplayCallback

The display function is called by GLUT and at the moment displays a bunch of cubes in a circle

reshape :: ReshapeCallback

The reshape function is called whenever the window gets resized

keyboardMouse :: IORef GLfloat -> IORef (GLfloat, GLfloat) -> KeyboardMouseCallback

The keyboardMouse function is called whenever the user hits a key or does something with the mouse This one uses the keys:

  • space -> reverse direction
  • + -> increase speed
  • - -> decrease speed
  • left -> move left
  • right -> move right
  • up -> move up
  • down -> move downs
